branchCategory.name: 2 Port Direct Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/8 ~ 1/2 inch
branchCategory.description: <p>The VX2 series is 2 port direct solenoid valve for general purpose air, medium vacuum and water. Available body materials include resin, aluminum, brass or stainless steel with port size up to 1/2 inch. Resin body is offered with one touch fitting to reduce installation time. It is also available as a manifold to reduce piping.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 2 Port Direct Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/8 ~ 1/2 inch

branchItem.name: VX2*0, Single Unit, Direct Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Air
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>IP65 enclosure <LI> Normally Closed and Normally Open type available, Class B coil <LI>Special construction improves service life when compared with current shading coil <LI>Power consumption: size 1 - 4.5w; size 2 - 7w; size 3 - 10.5w <LI>Body material: aluminum, resin</LI></UL>
